awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 nomination.

fullplot: The Smurl family move into their new home on Chase Street only to find that it is plagued with three spirits and a demon. The demon wants to destroy their family and they are constantly desperate until they find the Warren family to get rid of them.
plot: When the Smurl family moves into a duplex, they find out its haunted.
title: The Haunted
writers: Robert Curran (based upon the book by)
Jack Smurl (based upon the book by)
Janet Smurl (based upon the book by)
Ed Warren (based upon the book by)
Lorraine Warren (based upon the book by)
